abstract.t: This document specifies a new iCalendar (RFC 5545) calendar component that allows the publication of available and unavailable time periods associated with a calendar user. This component can be used in standard iCalendar free-busy lookups, including iTIP (RFC 5546 ) free-busy requests, to generate repeating blocks of available or busy time with exceptions as needed. This document also defines extensions to Calendaring Extensions to WebDAV (CalDAV) calendar access protocol (RFC 4791) and the associated scheduling protocol (RFC 6638) to specify how this new calendar component can be used when evaluating free-busy time.
